content: The Act may be cited as the "National Oilheat Research Alliance Reauthorization Act of 2011" and includes amendments. The National Oilheat Research Alliance Act of 2000 is amended to replace "oilheat" with "oilheat fuel" in various sections, including definitions and information on energy conservation strategies, safety, new technologies, and assistance programs for oilheat fuel consumers. The National Oilheat Research Alliance Act of 2000 is amended to change the timeline for Alliance establishment to 7 years after the enactment of the National Oilheat Research Alliance Reauthorization Act of 2011. SEC. 3. RENEWABLE FUEL CONTENT. The National Oilheat Research Alliance Act of 2000 is amended to prioritize research on developing renewable fuels compatible with oilheat equipment. The Alliance must report on the use of biofuels in oilheat equipment, including environmental and economic benefits, technical limitations, market acceptance, and government involvement.
